ingredients.ingredient: 2 large skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
salt and black pepper to taste
salt and black pepper to taste
½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese, divided
¼ cup Italian seasoned bread crumbs

cookingTips: Butterfly chicken breasts or pound flat between plastic wrap before stuffing for even cooking
Place asparagus spears and cheese inside carefully, then roll and secure with toothpicks
Bake at 375°F for 25-30 minutes until internal temperature reaches 165°F
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Are you comfortable butterflying and stuffing chicken? Would you like detailed guidance on the process?
